description: Dry seed

Elongation of radicle. Formation of root hairs

Cotyledons completely unfolded

Harvestable vegetative plant parts have reached final size (Cutting of soybean plants for feeding purposes)
First flower buds visible
First flower buds enlarged
First flower petals visible, flower buds still closed
First flowers opened (sporadically in population)
Beginning of flowering: about 10% of flowers open. Beginning of flowering
About 20% of flowers open
About 30% of flowers open
About 40% of flowers open
Full flowering: about 50% of flowers open. Main period of flowering
About 60% of flowers open
Flowering declining
End of flowering: first pods visible (approx. 5 mm length)
First pod reached final length (15–20 mm)
About 10% of pods have reached final length (15–20 mm). Beginning of pod development
About 20% of pods have reached final length (15–20 mm)
About 30% of pods have reached final length (15–20 mm). Beginning of pod filling
About 40% of pods have reached final length (15–20 mm)
About 50% of pods have reached final length (15–20 mm). Continuation of pod filling. Main period of pod development Continuation of pod filling
About 70% of pods have reached final length (15–20 mm). Advanced pod filling. Advanced pod filling
Approx. all pods have reached final length (15–20 mm). Seeds filling the cavity of the majority of pods
First pod ripe, beans final colour, dry and hard
Beginning of ripening. About 10% of pods are ripe, beans final colour, dry and hard. Beginning of pod and seed ripening
About 20% of pods are ripe. Beans final colour, dry and hard
About 30% of pods are ripe. Beans final colour, dry and hard
About 40% of pods are ripe. Beans final colour, dry and hard
Advanced ripening. About 50% of pods are ripe. Beans final colour, dry and hard. Main period of pod and seed ripening
About 60% of pods are ripe. Beans final colour, dry and hard
About 70% of pods are ripe. Beans final colour, dry and hard
About 80% of pods are ripe. Beans final colour, dry and hard
Full maturity: approx. all pods are ripe. Beans final colour, dry and hard (= Harvest maturity). Majority of pods are ripe. Beans final colour, dry and hard
About 10% of leaves discoloured or fallen
About 20% of leaves discoloured or fallen

About 60% of leaves discoloured or fallen
